verbs.description: [V: According] to reports , Donald Trump does not have his phone reviewed for potential hacks or breaches of security .
According to reports , Donald Trump [V: does] not have his phone reviewed for potential hacks or breaches of security .
[ARGM-ADV: According to reports] , [ARG0: Donald Trump] does [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: have] [ARG1: his phone reviewed for potential hacks or breaches of security] .
According to reports , Donald Trump does not have [ARG1: his phone] [V: reviewed] [ARG2: for potential hacks or breaches of security] .
